dcterms:description: A dataset used for robustly testing the norm of a high-dimensional sparse signal vector under Gaussian noise, with a focus on distinguishing between zero and non-zero norms.
dcterms:title: Sparse Gaussian Mean Testing

dcterms:creator: A. Carpentier
O. Collier

dcterms:description: A dataset for testing in sparse linear regression models, focusing on the sample complexity required to distinguish between zero and non-zero regression coefficients.
dcterms:title: Sparse Linear Regression Model

dcterms:creator: Jerry Li
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on robust sparse estimation tasks in high dimensions, addressing the challenges posed by adversarial corruptions.
dcterms:title: Robust Sparse Mean Estimation

dcterms:creator: Liu Liu
Yanyao Shen

Constantine Caramanis
dcterms:description: A dataset for high-dimensional robust sparse regression, focusing on the complexities introduced by adversarial corruptions in regression tasks.
dcterms:title: Robust Sparse Linear Regression

dcterms:creator: Quentin Berthet
Philippe Rigollet
dcterms:description: A dataset for optimal detection of sparse principal components in high dimensions, focusing on the statistical challenges in identifying these components.
dcterms:title: Sparse Principal Components

dcterms:creator: Ilias Diakonikolas
Daniel M. Kane
Alistair Stewart
dcterms:description: A dataset for statistical query lower bounds in robust estimation of high-dimensional Gaussians and Gaussian mixtures, focusing on the complexities of these tasks.
dcterms:title: Gaussian Mixtures
